title: Integrated Education Program for Variable and Feedback Processing

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Customized program for strengthening science-related job competencies, utilizing actual workplace problems as project themes; provides flexible learning environments using personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles of variable declaration and application, and apply them to scientific data analysis scenarios.
Learners can diagnose and correct issues using a two-attempt feedback system when errors occur.
Learners can visualize variable processing logic and quantitatively evaluate feedback results through project-based assignments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
